EmailTemplate.subject: Order Yeovil Parts from Regional Distribution Centers
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> Dear Customer:
To better support your orders for commercial spare parts designed in our Yeovil, United Kingdom (UK) site, Honeywell Aerospace will soon ship these parts from our three regional distribution centers. We are committed to improving our processes to help us deliver superior and consistent customer service.
This change goes into effect on January 7, 2019. Please see the list of impacted part numbers here <https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/Yeovil_Impacted Part Number List_Nov2018.xlsb>.
What is the change?
- Orders for impacted commercial spare parts designed in Yeovil, Somerset, UK should no longer be ordered from that facility. This excludes orders for non-commercial military and OEM orders. - Order directly from one of the distribution centers identified below through the MyAerospace Portal. <[[https://myaerospace.honeywell.com/]]> - Please do not email the direct Yeovil email address (yeovil.spares@honeywell.com) – this will no longer to be used.
Why are we making this change?
- Regional distribution centers maintain stock to better support your needs, resulting in faster delivery times. - It’s easier to order from regional distribution centers because they are fully integrated into the ordering and order status applications on MyAerospace. - Orders placed on MyAerospace or through Electronic Data Interface (EDI) are automatically routed to the closest regional center for fulfillment.
What about my existing orders?
- There is no impact to orders received before January 7, 2019. They will be processed and shipped through the current process.
What do I need to know about placing new orders and obtaining new quotes?
- New quote requests and purchase orders issued on or after January 7, 2019 should be sent to the regional distribution center instead of to our Yeovil, UK site. - The regional distribution centers are fully integrated with the MyAerospace order application. - Use MyAerospace to request a quote, place your order, view order status, confirm identified delivery dates and obtain way bill information.
